titles.title: I'm Going On, Right On, That Is All I Know

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm going on, right on, that is all I know.
I'm going on, right on, that is all I know.
I'm going on to that city,
To that city that's prepared for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: I'm pressing in, right in, that is all I know, etc.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I'm going down, down, down, that is all I see (2x)
I'm going down, into death
That I might come forth in life.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: I'm going up, up, up, that is all I know, etc.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I'm going on, right on, to the death of the cross
I'm going on, right on, no matter what it costs
I'm going on to perfection
To be in union with my Father God.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
/Seguiré, seguiré, cuán dispuesto estoy/ (2)
Seguiré a al casa, al lugar preparado para mí.
/Moriré, moriré, cuán dispuesto estoy/ (2)
Moriré, en la cruz, en la cruz preparada para mí.
/Venceré, venceré, cuán dispuesto estoy/ (2)
Venceré, al enemigo
En la cruz preparada para mí.
